article_title: Seattle Wades Into Fight Over Oil Drilling
article_text:
SEATTLE—Law enforcement detained dozens of protesters Monday for trying to block a Royal Dutch Shell PLC oil rig from departing the Port of Seattle for drilling off Alaska—the latest development in a weekslong standoff in which environmental activists have been joined by an unusual ally: the city itself.

Monday’s action took place after the Polar Pioneer and its support vessels attempted to leave the port about 6 a.m. to begin...

twitter.description: City Council members join activists in opposing the arrival of an Arctic drilling rig, in the latest example of local action against the oil industry.
twitter.title: Seattle Wades Into Fight Over Oil Drilling
